long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension that gives you easy access to pages relevant to students at Arcada UAES and integrates ARBS Course Calendar, Food listing and latest news. 

New features!

0.5.7.1
* Fixed Lunch listing. Again.

0.5.7
* Fixed Lunch listing from Arcada.

0.5.6.6
* Fixed calendar bug if comment field is empty
* Fixed link to lecture bug when comment field is empty
* Fixed colors to more uniform
* Fixed scrolling in Calendar and News feed

0.5.6.2
* Added feature where Student Associations can list their Events in the news feed
* Fixed some language 
* Fixed colors of fonts 
* Fixed broken links

0.5.6
* Added links to HanSE, HOSK, ASKEN and Start
* Added feature where user can enter name of a teacher to get that teachers calendar
* Some bug fixes

0.5.5.4
* Updated icons for store and in extension to higher quality.

0.5.5.2 
* Fixed issue where settings shortcut didn't work if user entered a invalid ARBS link

0.5.5.1 
* Fixed news heading size

0.5.5
* Easy Access to Settings from Cog in Extension
* Instructions howto obtain ARBS Link added to options
* Cleaned up design for a more compact view
* User can select which links show up in settings
* User can browse Events and News by clicking right and left sides of the elements
* Fixed Design bugs
